label: Monthly Status Report Submission
quote: Monthly Status Report 7th day (calendar day) of each month.

label: Security Awareness and Privacy Training Completion
quote: All contractor employees and subcontractors that have access to sensitive DHS/CBP data and to Sensitive Personally Identifiable Information (SPII) are required to complete IT security awareness training on an annual basis.

label: Annual Notification of Training Completion Submission
quote: Contractors are required to submit an annual notification to the COR indicating the required training has been completed for all contractor employees and subcontractors. This notification will be in the form of an email. This email must include the last name, first name, and date training was completed.

label: Initial Training and Notification Before Work Eligibility
quote: This initial training and notification will be completed before any contract employee or subcontractor will be allowed to perform work related to this SOW.

label: Training for New Employees/Subcontractors Before Work Eligibility
quote: During the course of this effort, any new contract employees and/or subcontractors must complete this training before they will be allowed to perform work related to this SOW;

label: Compliance with Federal and DHS Security Requirements
quote: The Contractor is fully responsible and accountable for ensuring compliance with all Federal Information Security Management Act (FISMA), National Institute of Standards and Technology (NIST) Federal Information Processing Standard (FIPS), and related DHS security control requirements (to include configuration guides, hardening guidance, DHS Security Policy, Procedures, and Architectural guidance). All services provided under this contract must be compliant with DHS Information Security Policy, identified in MD140-01, Information Technology Systems Security and 4300A Sensitive Systems Handbook.
